name: REalyse
description:
We are a a big data analytics company built by quantitative analysts who have expertise in both finance and property which is reflected in our product and philosophy. 

We enable residential property developers and investors to determine where, when and what to develop. With our platform, users can cut down the time spent on a typical appraisal and site selection process by 90%. This, in turn, can help ensure that future properties are built in the right areas, at times when the public need and want them. This is why we work with some of the best property developers, investors and agents in the UK.

jobs.title: Sales Executive - Ongoing Hiring
jobs.description:
REalyse is continually seeking new Sales Executives to join our growing team. Ideally you will need to have a background in either real estate or in SaaS sales for this role.  

We are looking for people who can use their abilities to help real estate development and investment clients understand how technology can help them more efficiently make decisions, rapidly closing deals in a consultative manner. This means identifying a unique subset of skilled salespeople who are truly invested in their growth and the growth of the REalyse brand.

About the Company
Our vision is to transform the world’s most valuable asset class. By making it faster, easier and more efficient for property professionals to determine where, when and what to build.
Using our big data analytics platform, users can save 90% of the time they previously spent on the typical appraisal or investment selection process. This, in turn, can ensure that property companies can increase returns and reduce their risks and costs.

REalyse has been recognised as one of the leading property technology companies in the UK and globally and works with a range of real estate companies across development, lending, consulting and investment.  

We believe that real estate is fundamentally connected to almost everything and that better data leads to better decisions and ultimately happier people. 

About the Team
REalyse is a small and quickly growing company that has worked hard to foster a culture that empowers team members to be themselves and to push the envelope of what’s possible. 


About the Role
We believe in the challenger model of sales, as we know in today’s environment to be a sales leader, you need to be an expert not only on your product but on the industry. REalyse will ensure we’re there to train and support you so you can become a successful sales executive. 

What You'll Do:
- Generate sales revenue.
- Advise prospective clients on how the REalyse platform can improve their business.
- Identify and develop new sales opportunities for targeted marketing.
- Execute content marketing in your accounts and verticals.
- Take ownership of all aspects of your sales pipeline and related support.
- Represent REalyse with prospects, client partners, third parties, and industry events.
- Partner with the CSM to maximise client satisfaction during implementation.
- Participate in product strategy definition with the product team.
- Aid in the recruitment, training and development of future REalyse Senior Sellers.

Ideal Skills & Expertise:
- 4+ Years experience in enterprise, or mid-tier software sales or real estate.
- Clearly demonstrated track record of success.
- Experience of executive level sales and presenting to senior management.
- Knowledge of finance or real estate is a plus
- Salesforce, Linkedin, Office 365

Personality:
- Desire to implement process automation and awareness of the latest sales technology and trends.
- Confident, creative and capable in dealing with senior staff from major organisations, as well as from smaller companies.
- Able to learn and adapt quickly, understanding the industry, use cases and reasons why to use REalyse.
- Collaborative, inclusive and driven attitude, adding to the culture of the company and striving for the best. 

Compenstation:
Salary: £30K - 60K
OTE: £60-100K
